name: Neon Runner (RossCurry)
description:
By Ross Curry

Unreal Engine 4

Alpha Version 0.0.01

_______________________________________________________________________________________

*Controls*

Left Key - Move Left

Right Key - Move Right

Spacebar - Jump

_______________________________________________________________________________________

*Story*

You are a supercharged runaway machine. A self aware robot named "Ares". Escaping from your evil creators you must collect health, fuel and master your abilities to escape the laboratory. The scientist have set a timer to destroy the lab and purge all assets, you have a limited time to escape!

If you find any bugs or would like to give me a comment on the game, please end any inquiries to:

rossacurry@gmail.com

*Known Bugs*

-Cursor disappearing and not working properly on main menu. Press window key and click menu, then play.

-Very rarely a full wall of red barriers spawns.

-Magnet not working.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Updates 

First update including multiple fixes for UI, Menu, and barrier spawns coming soon!
